data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Pulwama.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pulwama, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Pulwama to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Pulwama, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Pulwama access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Rajput Gakkhar people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, encourage the 442 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Pulwama, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Pulwama to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Pulwama
